DOC.brief_summary: This study assess effect nutrition support product quality life adult compromise gut function malabsorption .
DOC.brief_title: Effect UGIR Adults With Compromised Gut Function Malabsorption
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , non-randomized , open-label study assess effect nutrition support product quality life adult compromise gut function malabsorption . Adults irritable bowel syndrome ( IBS ) , inflammatory bowel disease ( IBD ) celiac disease enrol study ask take study product 6 week . The primary measure study validate quality life questionnaire , Gastrointestinal Quality Life Index ( GIQLI ) . Secondary measure include Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire ( IBDQ ) , Celiac Disease Questionnaire ( CDQ ) , Digestive Symptom Frequency Questionnaire ( DSFQ ) .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index 19 40 kg/m2 Previous diagnosis ulcerative colitis ( UC ) , Crohn 's disease , irritable bowel syndrome ( IBS ) , celiac disease Gastroenterologic surgery within 3 month study period Have colostomy ileostomy bag Malignancy within last 5 year Women lactating , pregnant planning pregnancy study period Taking antibiotic , antiparasitic , antifungal medication Initiation change supplement medication within 28 day prior screen
